author: Special Correspondent
text:
Engineers and field staff of the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation conducted surprise checks on 991 power connections in different parts of Tiruverumbur section on Tuesday and detected violations in some of them.

A Tangedco press release here said that a member team of engineers and field staff team led by Sri Sukumar, Executive Engineer (operations and maintenance), Tiruchi East, carried out the surprise checks in Tiruverumbur, Prakash Nagar, Cauvery Nagar, Vengur, and so on. The Tangedco would continue to conduct such surprise checks.
title: Tangedco staff conduct checks
